title: Sydney Sweeney Is Reportedly "Casually" Dating Scooter Braun
description: Sweeney confirmed her split from fiancé Jonathan Davino earlier this year.
content:
• None Sydney Sweeney is reportedly "hooking up" with manager Scooter Braun.
• None Sweeney ended things with her longtime fiancé Jonathan Davino earlier this year.

Sydney Sweeney is looking for love again—and this time, it's with Justin Bieber's former manager Scooter Braun. On Tuesday, People revealed that the Euphoria star and Braun are "casually hooking up," per an anonymous insider.

"Everything is casual," an additional source told the outlet, adding that Sweeney "is living her life and working hard."

Reps for both parties did not immediately respond to InStyle’s request for comment. Sweeney was formerly engaged to businessman Jonathan Davino, while the SB Projects founder divorced his first wife, Yael Cohen, back in 2022.

Braun and the actress were in attendance at Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's wedding earlier this summer, among other stars such as Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner, and Leonardo DiCaprio.

Back in May, Sweeney broke her silence on her relationship status following reports that she and her longtime fiancé had called it squits. She confirmed their breakup in an interview with The Times and shared some insight into what single life looks like for her right now.

The American Eagle spokesmodel addressed split speculation, telling the publication “No,” when asked if she was still planning her wedding with Davino. Sweeney then explained that she was single, revealing that she’d broken off her engagement three years after Davino popped the question in 2022. The couple was first romantically linked in 2018.

While Sweeney didn’t share whether she’s dating anyone new (including rumors about her relationship with former co-star Glen Powell), she revealed that she’s thriving in her single era. “I’m learning a lot about myself, spending more time with my friends. And I’m loving it," she explained.
summary: Sydney Sweeney is reportedly dating Justin Bieber's former manager, Scooter Braun, after ending her relationship with her longtime fiancé, Jonathan Davino, earlier in the year. An anonymous source reported that the two are "casually hooking up" and working hard. This comes after Sweeney broke her silence about her relationship status in an interview with The Times and shared some insights about her single life. Both parties have yet to comment on the reported relationship.
shortSummary: Sydney Sweeney is reportedly dating Scooter Braun, following her fiancé's divorce, and is thriving in her single era.

scraped_sources.text: Taylor Swift's Music Catalog Purchase Elicits an Unexpected Response From Scooter Braun "I am happy for her." By Christina Perrier Christina Perrier Christina Perrier is InStyle’s assistant editor and a writer in the fashion, celebrity, and lifestyle spaces. InStyle's editorial guidelines Published on May 30, 2025 @ 04:23PM Close Credit: Getty Images Scooter Braun had a surprisingly nice reaction to Taylor Swift buying the rights to her first six albums.He told Us Weekly, "I am happy for her," in wake of the news.This marks the end of Swift and Braun's six-year feud over ownership of her music catalog. After a six-year feud with Scooter Braun over the rights to her first six albums, Taylor Swift has finally purchased her entire music catalog. At last, the music mogul has won the battle, buying her master recordings, and Braun had a surprisingly nice reaction to her acquisition. "I am happy for her," Braun told Us Weekly in a statement. Taylor Swift performs at Wembley Stadium during The Eras Tour on June 23, 2024, in London, England. Getty Images The "Fortnight" singer broke the news that she bought her entire discography back from Shamrock Capital earlier today. Braun had previously sold the catalog to the venture capital firm after he purchased it from Big Machine Records in 2019. "To say this is my greatest dream come true is actually being pretty reserved about it," Swift wrote in a letter published on her website. "All of the music I've ever made...now belongs...to me." Taylor Swift attends the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards on September 11, 2024, in New York. Getty Images She also detailed her drama with Braun, writing, "I learned about Scooter Braun's purchase of my masters as it was announced to the world. All I could think about was the incessant, manipulative bullying I've received at his hands for years. Scooter has stripped me of my life’s work, that I wasn’t given an opportunity to buy… Essentially, my musical legacy is about to lie in the hands of someone who tried to dismantle it.” The dispute is also explained in her 2024 docu-series Taylor Swift vs. Scooter Braun: Bad Blood. Related Stories Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's Engagement Is "100 Percent" Happening, Insider Source Says Taylor Swift Steps Out For a Rare Outing Amid Travis Kelce Engagement Rumors The 14-time Grammy winner also addressed questions surrounding Reputation (Taylor's Version), sharing that the new album likely won't come any time soon, considering she now owns the original. Taylor Swift performs during The Eras Tour on December 6, 2024, in Vancouver, British Columbia. Getty Images "To be perfectly honest, it's the one album in those first 6 that I thought couldn't be improved upon by redoing it. Not the music, or photos, or videos. So I kept putting it off," she wrote, adding that she "hasn't even recorded a quarter of it." It doesn't mean it will never happen, as is the case with her debut album. "Those 2 albums can still have their moment to re-emerge when the time is right, if that would be something you guys are excited about," she penned. Read more: News Entertainment

Sydney Sweeney is making news, we're bringing you the latest on the actress, including her best red carpet looks and the latest roles she's earned since her breakouts on 'The White Lotus' and 'Euphoria.' Then steal her signature bombshell style with makeup and hair tutorials as well as shopping info on Sydney's best celebrity street-style and red carpet outfits.

Sydney Sweeney Breaks Her Silence on Her Breakup While Opening Up About Single Life The 'Euphoria' star finally confirmed her split from ex-fiancé Jonathan Davino. By Lara Walsh Lara Walsh Lara Walsh is a Chicago-based writer and editor who covers all things fashion, celebrity, pop culture, travel, and food. When she’s not avidly planning her next trip, she’s writing posts for her travel blog or mapping out her next foodie adventure. InStyle's editorial guidelines Published on May 31, 2025 @ 12:14PM Close Sydney Sweeney at the 2025 Met Gala on May 5. Credit: Getty Images Sydney Sweeney broke her silence on her relationship with fiancé Jonathan Davino in a new interview with The Times published on May 31.The Anyone But You star confirmed the former couple has broken up while opening up about dating.Sweeney said she's "loving" single life. Sydney Sweeney is breaking her silence on her relationship status, months after reports that she and longtime fiancé Jonathan Davino had called it quits in April. The Euphoria alum finally confirmed their breakup in an interview with The Times published on Sunday, May 31— and shared some insight into what single life looks like for her right now. The Anyone But You actress addressed split speculation, telling the publication “No,” when asked if she was still planning her wedding with Davino. Sweeney then explained that she was single, confirming she’d broken off her engagement three years after Davino popped the question in 2022. The couple was first romantically linked in 2018. Sydney Sweeney with Jonathan Davino in January 2025. Getty Images While Sweeney didn’t reveal whether she’s dating anyone new (including rumors about her relationship with former co-star Glen Powell), she revealed that she’s thriving in her single era. “I’m learning a lot about myself, spending more time with my friends. And I’m loving it," she shared. Sydney Sweeny on the red carpet in March 2024. Getty Images Sweeney has been busy giving fans a glimpse into her new reality, including hard-launching her new puppy, a rescue pitbull and terrier mix named Tank, while wearing a slew of bikinis on Instagram. She’s also been busy filming a slew of projects, including Euphoria and a biopic about boxer Christy Martin—and sources said her career might have played a part in ending her relationship. Related Stories Sydney Sweeney and Glen Powell Spotted Hanging Out in Dallas Amid Rumors of Sweeney’s Split from Fiancé Sydney Sweeney Wears a Tiny Striped Bikini While Introducing Her New Dog After Breakup "She's exactly where she wants to be. Most people would feel overwhelmed by her working schedule this year, but not Syd. She's all about working right now and very excited about all her projects," a source previously told People. Sydney Sweeney with ex Jonathan Davino in Paris in July 2024. Getty Images "She's not ready to settle down," the source added. “They only lasted for this long because it was hard for her to break it off. They didn't split because there is no love. They split because she just wants to focus on her career right now." Read more: News Celebrity Celebrity Couples

Sydney Sweeney and Scooter Braun Are 'Casually' Dating (Sources) "Everything is casual. She is living her life and working hard," one source tells PEOPLE By Gillian Telling Gillian Telling Gillian Telling is a Senior Reporter at People, where she has worked for 10 years. Her work has previously been seen Entertainment Weekly, Rolling Stone and Cosmopolitan. People Editorial Guidelines and Jen Juneau Jen Juneau Jen Juneau is a News and Movies Staff Writer at PEOPLE. She started at the brand in 2016 and has more than 15 years' professional writing experience. People Editorial Guidelines Updated on September 2, 2025 05:31PM EDT 31 Comments Sydney Sweeney in Beverly Hills, California, on March 2, 2025; Scooter Braun in Washington, D.C., on Nov. 18, 2024. Credit : Phillip Faraone/VF25/Getty; Jemal Countess/Getty NEED TO KNOW Sydney Sweeney is "casually" dating Scooter Braun, multiple sources tell PEOPLEMusic exec Braun was previously married to Yael Cohen, with whom he shares three kids, from 2014 to 2022Sweeney broke her silence abouts her split from ex-fiancé Jonathan Davino in May, confirming they'd broken up Sydney Sweeney and Scooter Braun are "casually hooking up," a source tells PEOPLE. Another insider confirms the two are indeed seeing each other. Says an additional source: "Everything is casual. She is living her life and working hard." Both Sweeney, 27, and Braun, 44, were among the starry guest list who attended Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's Venice wedding in June. Reps for Sweeney and Braun could not be reached for comment. Star was the first to report. The news comes months after Sweeney and ex-fiancé Jonathan Davino called off their engagement. Braun previously married Yael Cohen in 2014, before splitting in 2021 and settling their divorce the following year. The record executive shares three children with activist Cohen: sons Jagger, 10, and Levi, 8, plus daughter Hart, 6. Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human-interest stories. Jonathan Davino and Sydney Sweeney in Los Angeles on Oct. 23, 2018; Yael Cohen and Scooter Braun in Los Angeles on June 10, 2021. Charley Gallay/Getty; Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Sweeney and Davino, a businessman from Chicago, first sparked rumors that they were dating in 2018, and got engaged in 2022. The actress called off their wedding in March after months of split rumors. "She didn't feel right about it," a source told PEOPLE at the time. "She is in the middle of this magical career that she could only dream of a few years ago. This is what she wants to focus on right now." "Things have been rocky for a long time," an insider told PEOPLE that same month. Related Stories Sydney Sweeney and Ex-Fiancé Jonathan Davino's Relationship Timeline Inside Taylor Swift’s Longtime Feud with Scooter Braun — and How She Reclaimed Her Music Catalog Years After He Bought It In an interview with The Times published May 31, Sweeney confirmed her split from Davino, 42, and also said she was single at the time of the interview. “I’m learning a lot about myself, spending more time with my friends. And I’m loving it," the actress added to The Times. Sweeney is currently in production for Euphoria season 3. Her boxing biopic Christy will make its world premiere at the 2025 Toronto International Film Festival this month, and she stars opposite Amanda Seyfried in the book-to-screen adaptation of The Housemaid, in theaters this Christmas. Sydney Sweeney in Hollywood, California, on Aug. 10, 2023; Scooter Braun in Los Angeles on Feb. 27, 2020. Matt Winkelmeyer/Variety via Getty; Rich Fury/Getty Braun gave rare comments about his current relationship with Cohen, 38, during an interview with Danielle Robay for an episode of her podcast Question Everything, which aired July 17. Calling Cohen "one of my best friends," Braun said they talk "every day" and added, "We don't even call each other 'ex.' That's like my partner. That's the mother of my children." Our new app is here! Free, fun and full of exclusives. Scan to download now! He also shared that Cohen is his "family for life," explaining, "I have a tattoo on my finger that says 'same team' after my divorce because she and I are on the same team for life. That's what we say to each other." Of rumors that Taylor Swift's 2022 Midnights track "Vigilante S---" is about the split between himself and Cohen, Braun continued, "No, I never thought that was about us. [Yael] never thought it was about us and everyone else kind of feeding into the fire. Great strategy move, but nah." Additional reporting by Elizabeth Rosner Elizabeth Rosner Elizabeth Rosner joined PEOPLE as a Senior Reporter in 2024. argos_summary: Sydney Sweeney, the Euphoria star, is reportedly "casually" dating Scooter Braun, the former manager of Justin Bieber. The relationship was revealed by an anonymous insider to People, with both parties' reps not responding. Sweeney ended her engagement to Jonathan Davino earlier this year and has been focusing on her career. The couple were seen together at Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's wedding earlier this summer.
